top.style: Minimal leather-and-suede-inspired bikini top with triangular panels
top.color: Earth tones (warm tan, muted turquoise accents)
top.design_details: Fringe elements, subtle beadwork, and natural-texture stitching
top.fit: Very minimal coverage designed to accentuate a full, prominent bust
top.interaction: Lightly held at the straps by both hands, emphasizing chest and posture

bottom.color: Matching earth tones with turquoise bead accents
bottom.design_details: Fringe and asymmetrical cut inspired by indigenous fantasy fashion
bottom.fit: Minimal coverage sitting low on the hips, highlighting obliques and V-cut abs

clothing.accessories: Optional subtle tribal-inspired armband or feather accent, no modern jewelry
